name: Unplug
description:
Control a small robot and throw your head to other decapitated robot bodies to take control of them. Each body has its own special attack and ability! Use them to solve puzzles and explore an abandoned factory in search of The Upgrade Cartridge.

Best played with a controller!

This prototype game was made over four weeks as part of an assignment to make an action-adventure game for Dawson College's Independent Video Game Design program.

Install Instructions

1. Download the windows or mac build.
2. Locate the .zip you've downloaded and extract it.
3. Inside of the "Unplug" folder, double-click the ActionAdventure.exe, enjoy!
4. If you get a "Windows Protected your PC" screen, click "More Info", and then click "Run Anyway".

Controls

The controls are also available in game!

Game-pad

UI 
Left Stick: Navigate Menus 
South Button: Confirm Selection

In-Game
Left Stick: Character movement
Right Trigger: Throw Head 
South Button: Dash
West Button: Attack
Start: Pause menu

Keyboard + Mouse

UI 
WASD: Navigate menus
Enter: Confirm selection

In-Game
WASD: Move Character
E: Throw Head
Space: Dash
Left-Click Mouse: Attack

Escape: Pause menu
